name: Denilson

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: I transform raw data into actionable insights using Python, Power BI, and SQL to create intuitive dashboards and models for decision-making.

services.title: API Development
services.description: I design and deploy APIs using Django and Node.js to enable seamless integrations and enhance functionality in web platforms.

services.title: Process Automation
services.description: I automate workflows using Python, Excel VBA, and other tools to reduce manual tasks and improve efficiency in organizational processes.

services.title: Machine Learning
services.description: I design and implement machine learning solutions to optimize processes, improve decision-making, and solve real-world problems such as attendance tracking and data predictions.
